rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0001
rows.name: Got some good news for ya today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0002
rows.name: We found another Life Point fragment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Your mission this time is to head to that Life Point
and conduct a preliminary investigation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0006
rows.name:
The coordinates we have for it are
up north of NLA, in White Woods.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0007
rows.name:
One secâ€”White Woods?
According to the results of the most recent preliminary survey,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0008
rows.name:
it showed a high probability of being within
the Growth's sphere of influence...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0010
rows.name:
That's exactly why I want a team with top combat strength
to take it on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0012
rows.name:
It's something someone has to do.
We'll get started immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0013
rows.name: Sorry 'bout that. I really appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0014
rows.name:
Actually, Lao's team is already
heading there as an advance party.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Rendezvous with them here.
Counting on ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs09040100_MSG0016
rows.name:
The operating time has also dropped below half.
I'd be grateful if this turns out to be the one we need.[ST:wait ]
